info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 10 at 10:04PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles LA
info.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana...Texas...
Whisky Chitto Creek Near Mittie
Calcasieu River Near Kinder
Calcasieu River Near Glenmora
Bayou Vermilion Near Carencro
West Fork of The Calcasieu River At Sam Houston Jones SP
Bayou Des Cannes Near Eunice
Atchafalaya River At Morgan City
Calcasieu River Near Oberlin
Calcasieu River near White Oak Park
Calcasieu River Near Salt Water Barrier
Bayou Nezpique Near Basile
Mermentau River Near Mermentau
Vermilion River At Lafayette, Surrey Street Gage
Sabine River Near Deweyville
...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Louisiana...Texas...
Bundick Creek At Bundick Lake
Neches River at Neches River Saltwater Barrier
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...West Fork of The Calcasieu River at Sam Houston Jones SP.
* WHEN...Until further notice.
* IMPACTS...At 5.0 feet, Low spots on South Perkins Ferry Road have water on it. Water is over some boat docks on South Perkins Ferry Road and over boat ramps at Sam Houston Jones State Park. Extensive marshland flooding will occur upstream and downstream from the park.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:36 AM CDT Friday, May 09 the stage was 4.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 5.5 feet tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 5.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE
